roleset.name: revert from specialization

example.name: alias-v
example.text: ...while those that have dedifferentiated to a completely spheroidal mass can probably rdifferentiate to a pre-pluteus (helmet-shaped) stage at least.

example.name: dedifferentiation-n: non-biological usage
example.text: If it is a secondary development, the feasi- bility of its dedifferentiation from the ex- panded selachian hyomandibular is still questionable.
example.arg: from the ex- panded selachian hyomandibular

roleset.note: DEDIFFERENTIATE-V, DEDIFFERENTIATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.
